description: This file defines the exported API for the Simple CLI Shell (SCLISH) object, including function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the shell. It is primarily a header file declaring interfaces rather than implementation code.

methods.name: ScliCreateShell
methods.description: Creates a new shell instance given container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: ScliShoCreate
methods.description: Creates a Simple CLI Shell object with specified contexts.

methods.name: ScliShoRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified shell object.

methods.name: ScliShoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the shell object.

methods.name: ScliShoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the shell object, preparing it for use.
